pageTitle: XLoot : Bags, Bank, Inventory : World of Warcraft AddOns
textBeforeTable: Optional Files (3) Fixed all known issues. r72125: Fixed GOLD constant errors. r73744: WotLK fixes by Drizdt and Mikk. 0.9-30000-1: 3.3 compatibility update. 0.91-30300: (thx to Narzuhl for debugging it) - bugfix: SEELoot-1.0 library, need before greed roll counts 0.91.1-30300: 4.0 update r368: Channel list updates (What channels Master links to, LinkAll) r370: 4.2 update (Thanks to Dridzt) r372: - .toc update, compatible with Hour of Twilight (4.3) - bugfix: SEELoot-1.0, new roll and item handlers r373: - repackage XLoot to pickup new library. - revert a LOOT_ROLL_WON handler change in SEELoot-1.0 r374: - bugfix: Item Count not showing on loot buttons. - bugfix: localize a leaked global variable. r375: - reorder of loot roll and won handlers to fix for a rare error in XLootMonitor (seen in LFR) - repackage XLoot to pickup SEELoot-1.0 r222 r376: - Just in time to need a update for 5.2, apparently.
